    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        com.arangodb.velocypack.VPackSlice serialize(Object entity)
                                      throws ArangoDBException
        Serialize a given Object to VelocyPack
        Parameters:
        entity - The Object to serialize. If it is from type String, it will be handled as a Json.
        Returns:
        The serialized VelocyPack
        Throws:
        ArangoDBException

      • serialize

        com.arangodb.velocypack.VPackSlice serialize(Object entity,
                                             ArangoSerializer.Options options)
                                      throws ArangoDBException
        Serialize a given Object to VelocyPack
        Parameters:
        entity - The Object to serialize. If it is from type String, it will be handled as a Json.
        options - Additional options
        Returns:
        the serialized VelocyPack
        Throws:
        ArangoDBException

      • serialize

        @Deprecated
com.arangodb.velocypack.VPackSlice serialize(Object entity,
                                                          boolean serializeNullValues)
                                                   throws ArangoDBException
        Deprecated. use serialize(Object, Options) instead
        Serialize a given Object to VelocyPack
        Parameters:
        entity - The Object to serialize. If it is from type String, it will be handled as a Json.
        serializeNullValues - Whether or not null values should be excluded from serialization.
        Returns:
        the serialized VelocyPack
        Throws:
        ArangoDBException

      • serialize

        @Deprecated
com.arangodb.velocypack.VPackSlice serialize(Object entity,
                                                          boolean serializeNullValues,
                                                          boolean stringAsJson)
                                                   throws ArangoDBException
        Deprecated. use serialize(Object, Options) instead
        Serialize a given Object to VelocyPack. If the Object is from type Iterable the String will be interpreted as Json
        Parameters:
        entity - The Object to serialize. If it is from type String, it will be handled as a Json.
        serializeNullValues - Whether or not null values should be excluded from serialization.
        stringAsJson -
        Returns:
        the serialized VelocyPack
        Throws:
        ArangoDBException

      • serialize

        @Deprecated
com.arangodb.velocypack.VPackSlice serialize(Object entity,
                                                          Type type)
                                                   throws ArangoDBException
        Deprecated. use serialize(Object, Options) instead
        Serialize a given Object to VelocyPack. This method is for serialization of types with generic parameter like Collection, List, Map.
        Parameters:
        entity - The Object to serialize
        type - The source type of the Object.
        Returns:
        the serialized VelocyPack
        Throws:
        ArangoDBException

      • serialize

        @Deprecated
com.arangodb.velocypack.VPackSlice serialize(Object entity,
                                                          Type type,
                                                          boolean serializeNullValues)
                                                   throws ArangoDBException
        Deprecated. use serialize(Object, Options) instead
        Serialize a given Object to VelocyPack. This method is for serialization of types with generic parameter like Collection, List, Map.
        Parameters:
        entity - The Object to serialize
        type - The source type of the Object.
        serializeNullValues - Whether or not null values should be excluded from serialization.
        Returns:
        the serialized VelocyPack
        Throws:
        ArangoDBException

      • serialize

        @Deprecated
com.arangodb.velocypack.VPackSlice serialize(Object entity,
                                                          Type type,
                                                          Map<String,Object> additionalFields)
                                                   throws ArangoDBException
        Deprecated. use serialize(Object, Options) instead
        Serialize a given Object to VelocyPack. This method is for serialization of types with generic parameter like Collection, List, Map.
        Parameters:
        entity - The Object to serialize
        type - The source type of the Object.
        serializeNullValues - Whether or not null values should be excluded from serialization.
        additionalFields - Additional Key/Value pairs to include in the created VelocyPack
        Returns:
        the serialized VelocyPack
        Throws:
        ArangoDBException
